name: inertly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that does not move or is not able to move: Her left hand dropped inertly. Several turtles were floating inertly in shallow waters.
in a way that is not energetic or interesting: She sank inertly into an armchair. They stayed inertly in their room or on the beach. See
inert
More examplesFewer examplesThe three actors stood inertly, yards apart on the broad stage.The remains of the bridge hang inertly in the rain over the slow-moving river. His was neat and pale, with lifeless sandy hair brushed inertly to the shape of the head.
